title: TeamPicker View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game with the stats view feature flag enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the TeamPicker segments below the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be able to switch segments between the two teams available

AND

+ Stats will update as expected for the team selected

title: Batters View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a game with the stats view feature flag enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Box Score section of stats view
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the stats view for Batters with segments to switch between teams

AND

+ The batter's stats will update as the game progresses if the game is live

OR

+ The full box score with batting stats will be available if the viewer is observing the Gameday view for an archived game

title: Batting Results View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a live or archived game with the stats view feature flag enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the batting results section
custom_expected:
THEN

+ As the game progresses, the batting results update as well

AND

+ Examples are:
- Total Bases (TB)
- Runners left in scoring position, 2-out
- Grounded into douple-play (GIDP)
- Team RISP
- Team LOB

title: Baserunning View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing a live or archived game with the stats view feature flag enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ A runner is on base

AND

+ The user observes the baserunning view at the header section
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The expected bases will be filled in to display baserunners accurately

AND

+ This view updates accordingly as the game progresses

title: Fielding View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the stats view when launching a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the "Fielding" Section for the home or away team
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will see specific fielding stats available under the appropriate team, for example:

DP 
(Altuve-Pena-Caratini)

title: Pitching View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the stats view when launching a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the "Pitching" section under the away or home team
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a top row that consists of the following: 

PLAYER IP H R ER BB K HR ERA

+ The stats update appropriately as the game progresses

title: Game Data View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the stats view when launching a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the "Game Data" section of the stats view
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe specific game relevant information such as:

- HBP
- Pitch timer violations
- Pitches-strikes
- Groundouts-flyouts
- Batters faced
- Inherited runners-scored
- Umpires
- Weather
- Wind
- First pitch
- T
- Att
- Venue
- Date

title: Linescore View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the stats view when launching a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Linescore section under the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the away team row over the  home team 

AND

+ Inning columns from 1 to 9 (continues if any extra-innings)

AND

+ The data will update as expected as the game progresses and follows where the scrubber playhead is located.

title: Matchup View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the stats view when launching a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the matchup section at the top of the page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe:

- Away team logo with record underneath
- Away team score 
- Inning data above bases view
- Bases view above at-bat data, number of outs
- Home team score
- Home team logo with record underneath

title: Teams Header View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the stats view when launching a live or archived game on an iPad device
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the team names side by side under the line score in Portrait view
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the away team's nickname in a larger bold text with the correct data underneath

AND

+ The Home team's nickname in a larger bold text with the correct data underneath
